bibl.title: ΣΔ, A Christian Isopsephism?
bibl.note: At the end of the letter of recommendation P. Oxy. XXXVI, 2785 (IV AD) the writer added the letters σδ. A program has been written to search for (strings of) words in the Greek Bible whose letters add to 204. The result of the search is negative. It is now probable that σδ is not an isopsephism.
bibl.seg: LLEWELYN Stephen R., ΣΔ, A Christian Isopsephism?

At the end of the letter of recommendation P. Oxy. XXXVI, 2785 (IV AD) the writer added the letters σδ. A program has been written to search for (strings of) words in the Greek Bible whose letters add to 204. The result of the search is negative. It is now probable that σδ is not an isopsephism.
